channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- http-signature node module
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HackerOne -- http-signature node module

item.title: CVE-2017-16005|2024-08-05T20:13:06.813Z -- hackerone -- http-signature%20node%20module
item.description: Http-signature is a "Reference implementation of Joyent's HTTP Signature Scheme". In versions <=0.9.11, http-signature signs only the header values, but not the header names. This makes http-signature vulnerable to header forgery. Thus, if an attacker can intercept a request, he can swap header names and change the meaning of the request without changing the signature.
